segments.text: The scene in this kitchen is quite surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely oblivious to the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how she doesn't notice the puddle forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, instead of helping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is full of surprises, and not the good kind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the chaos inside is quite surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, but I'm not sure it will.
segments.speaker: PAR
